testcase.name: Add selected product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given Access Product selection url is accessed..............................passed When select first product "Sony vaio i5" from displayed product.............passed Then Add first product to cart..............................................passed And Validate that correct first product "Sony vaio i5" is selected..........passed Then Navigate to product selection home page................................passed And select second product "Dell i7 8gb" from displayed product..............passed Then Add second product to cart.............................................passed And Validate that correct second product "Dell i7 8gb" is selected..........passed Then Navigate to cart page..................................................passed Then Delete second product "Dell i7 8gb" from cart selection and Validate deleted product.passed Then Place the order........................................................passed And Fill form details with name "name" and country "country" and city "city" and card "3435" and month "12" and year "2022".passed And Purcase the Order.......................................................passed And Validate purchase id and amount in purchase order confirmation message..passed Then Close the Browser......................................................passed And Update test data file...................................................passed And Generate HTML report....................................................passed
